desc: Lagersmith sells wholesale canning supplies. Products available include brite cans (standard 12oz, 16oz, 375mL, 19.2oz; 12oz sleek; 750mL taproom cans), painted black or white cans, shrink sleeved cans, PakTechs, case trays, flats, 202 ends (silver, gold, and black).

layout.text: IF YOU BREW IT, WE WILL COME
We come to you.  Mobile canning and packaging, all on site.
